**संग्रह:**

* **VBScript:** VBScript एक client-side scripting भाषा है जो Microsoft Windows के लिए उपयोग किया जाता है।
* **PowerShell:** PowerShell एक PowerShell एक कमांड-line shell है जो Microsoft Windows के लिए उपयोग किया जाता है।
* **AutoHotkey:** AutoHotkey एक scripting भाषा है जो Windows के लिए उपयोग किया जाता है।

```vbscript
' Function to detect and block suspicious activity
Function BlockSuspiciousActivity()
    ' Get the current user's IP address
    Dim strIPAddress As String
    strIPAddress = GetIPAddress()

    ' Check if the IP address is blacklisted
    If IsIPAddressBlacklisted(strIPAddress) Then
        ' Block the user's IP address
        BlockIPAddress(strIPAddress)
    End If
End Function

' Function to get the current user's IP address
Function GetIPAddress() As String
    Dim objNetwork As Object
    Set objNetwork = CreateObject("WScript.Network")
    GetIPAddress = objNetwork.IPAddress
End Function

' Function to check if the IP address is blacklisted
Function IsIPAddressBlacklisted(strIPAddress) As Boolean
    Dim strBlacklistedIPs As String
    strBlacklistedIPs = "192.168.1.10, 192.168.1.11, 10.0.0.1" ' List of blacklisted IP addresses
    If InStr(strBlacklistedIPs, strIPAddress) Then
        IsIPAddressBlacklisted = True
    Else
        IsIPAddressBlacklisted = False
    End If
End Function

' Function to block the user's IP address
Function BlockIPAddress(strIPAddress) As Boolean
    Dim strBlockList As String
    strBlockList = "C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc\hosts" ' Path to hosts file
    Open strBlockList For Output As #1
    Print #1 strIPAddress & vbCrLf
    Close #1
    BlockIPAddress = True
End Function

' Run the function to detect and block suspicious activity
BlockSuspiciousActivity()
```
